author: Mike Vilensky
title: GOP Latches Onto Corruption Trial to Take Aim at Cuomo in Election Year
text:
New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo is ahead of his Republican challengers when it comes to fundraising and name-recognition in the governor’s race, but the GOP is trying to leverage an ongoing corruption case against a former Cuomo aide as a point of attack.
Outside the lower Manhattan courthouse on Thursday where Joseph Percoco, Mr. Cuomo’s former confidante, is on trial, Republican Sen. John DeFrancisco, who is running for governor, took a shot at Mr. Cuomo, saying the federal trial shows that to do business with the Cuomo administration...
